languages.text: "Все может быть, конечно. Он тяжело уходил. Тело отторгало лекарства и импланты, часто накатывал бред... это ломает даже сильнейших, заставляя сожалеть и каяться. Но даже если вы правы — этот ответ нас никак не приближает к загадке Фиделио".

"Anything is possible, I suppose. It was rough for him when he went. His body rejected medicine and implants, and he was raving on and off... These things can break even the strongest person, make them regret and repent. But even if you're right, this answer brings us no closer to solving the mystery of Fidelio."
languages.original_text: "Все может быть, конечно. Он тяжело уходил. Тело отторгало лекарства и импланты, часто накатывал бред... это ломает даже сильнейших, заставляя сожалеть и каяться. Но даже если вы правы — этот ответ нас никак не приближает к загадке Фиделио".

traits.locale_text: "Anything is possible, I suppose. It was rough for him when he went. His body rejected medicine and implants, he kept having delirious bouts... these things can break even the strongest, make them regret and repent. But even if you're right, this answer brings us no closer to solving the mystery of Fidelio."

"Anything is possible, I suppose. It was rough for him when he went. His body rejected medicine and implants, he kept having delirious bouts... these things can break even the strongest, make them regret and repent. But even if you're right, this answer brings us no closer to solving the mystery of Fidelio."

"Anything is possible, I suppose. It was rough for him when he went. His body rejected medicine and implants, and he was raving on and off... These things can break even the strongest person, make them regret and repent. But even if you're right, this answer brings us no closer to solving the mystery of Fidelio."

"Anything is possible, I suppose. It was rough for him when he went. His body rejected medicine and implants, and he was raving on and off... These things can break even the strongest person, make them regret and repent. But even if you're right, this answer brings us no closer to solving the mystery of Fidelio."

"Anything is possible, I suppose. It was rough for him when he went. His body rejected medicine and implants, and he was raving on and off... These things can break even the strongest person, make them regret and repent. But even if you're right, this answer brings us no closer to solving the mystery of Fidelio."

languages.text: “一切皆有可能，我猜。他最后那段日子很煎熬。他的身体排斥着所有的药物与植入物，而且他还时不时狂叫不止……这样的折磨足以击垮最坚强的人，让他们悔恨从前的所作所为，忏悔从前的罪行。但就算你说得没错，这个结论也并没有揭开菲迪奥的谜团。”
languages.original_text: "Anything is possible, I suppose. It was rough for him when he went. His body rejected medicine and implants, and he was raving on and off... These things can break even the strongest person, make them regret and repent. But even if you're right, this answer brings us no closer to solving the mystery of Fidelio."

traits.locale_text: “一切皆有可能，我猜。他最后那段日子很煎熬。他的身体排斥着所有的药物与植入物，而且他还时不时狂叫不止……这样的折磨足以击垮最坚强的人，让他们悔恨从前的所作所为，忏悔从前的罪行。但就算你说得没错，这个结论也并没有揭开菲迪奥的谜团。”

languages.text: «Supongo que todo es posible. Su final fue muy doloroso. Su cuerpo rechazaba la medicina y los implantes, y no dejaba de delirar... Estas cosas pueden quebrar la mente de las personas más fuertes y hacer que se arrepientan de todo. Pero, aunque tengas razón, eso no nos ayuda a resolver el misterio de Fidelio».
languages.original_text: "Anything is possible, I suppose. It was rough for him when he went. His body rejected medicine and implants, and he was raving on and off... These things can break even the strongest person, make them regret and repent. But even if you're right, this answer brings us no closer to solving the mystery of Fidelio."

traits.locale_text: «Supongo que todo es posible. Su final fue muy doloroso. Su cuerpo rechazaba la medicina y los implantes, y no dejaba de delirar... Estas cosas pueden quebrar la mente de las personas más fuertes y hacer que se arrepientan de todo. Pero, aunque tengas razón, eso no nos ayuda a resolver el misterio de Fidelio».

languages.text: 「その可能性は否定できませんね。彼の死に際はとても苦しいものでした。身体は薬やインプラントを拒絶し、絶え間なく暴れていました…このような状態が続けば、どれほど強い者でも折れてしまい、悔い改めるようになります。しかし、仮にあなたの言うことが正しかったとしても、フィデリオの正体は謎のままです」
languages.original_text: "Anything is possible, I suppose. It was rough for him when he went. His body rejected medicine and implants, and he was raving on and off... These things can break even the strongest person, make them regret and repent. But even if you're right, this answer brings us no closer to solving the mystery of Fidelio."

traits.locale_text: 「その可能性は否定できませんね。彼の死に際はとても苦しいものでした。身体は薬やインプラントを拒絶し、絶え間なく暴れていました…このような状態が続けば、どれほど強い者でも折れてしまい、悔い改めるようになります。しかし、仮にあなたの言うことが正しかったとしても、フィデリオの正体は謎のままです」

languages.text: "Natürlich ist alles möglich. Sein Dahinscheiden war qualvoll. Sein Körper verweigerte Medikamente und Implantate, und er war häufig im Wahn ... Derlei kann auch den Stärksten zerbrechen, ihn bedauern und bereuen lassen. Aber selbst wenn Ihr recht habt, bringt uns das der Lösung des Geheimnisses um Fidelio keinen Schritt näher."
languages.original_text: "Anything is possible, I suppose. It was rough for him when he went. His body rejected medicine and implants, and he was raving on and off... These things can break even the strongest person, make them regret and repent. But even if you're right, this answer brings us no closer to solving the mystery of Fidelio."

traits.locale_text: "Natürlich ist alles möglich." Sein Dahinscheiden war qualvoll. Sein Körper verweigerte Medikamente und Implantate, und er war häufig im Wahn ... Derlei kann auch den Stärksten zerbrechen, ihn bedauern und bereuen lassen. Aber selbst wenn Ihr recht habt, bringt uns das der Lösung des Geheimnisses um Fidelio keinen Schritt näher."

languages.text: « J'imagine que c'est une possibilité, oui. Il a beaucoup souffert sur la fin. Son corps rejetait aussi bien les médicaments que les implants, il divaguait... Ces choses-là peuvent briser même les plus solides d'entre nous, les pousser à regretter et à se repentir. Mais même si vous avez raison, ça ne nous aide en rien à résoudre le mystère de Fidélio. »
languages.original_text: "Anything is possible, I suppose. It was rough for him when he went. His body rejected medicine and implants, and he was raving on and off... These things can break even the strongest person, make them regret and repent. But even if you're right, this answer brings us no closer to solving the mystery of Fidelio."

traits.locale_text: « J'imagine que c'est une possibilité, oui. Il a beaucoup souffert sur la fin. Son corps rejetait aussi bien les médicaments que les implants, il divaguait... Ces choses-là peuvent briser même les plus solides d'entre nous, les pousser à regretter et à se repentir. Mais même si vous avez raison, ça ne nous aide en rien à résoudre le mystère de Fidélio. »

languages.text: "Her şey mümkün. Geçirdiği nöbetler onu zorluyordu. Bedeni, ilaçları ve implantları kabul etmiyordu. Arada çıldırır gibi oluyordu. Bunlar en güçlüleri bile tüketir, pişman eder ve tövbe etmesine vesile olur. Haklı olsanız bile bu cevap, bizi Fidelio gizemine ışık tutmaya yaklaştırmıyor maalesef."
languages.original_text: "Anything is possible, I suppose. It was rough for him when he went. His body rejected medicine and implants, and he was raving on and off... These things can break even the strongest person, make them regret and repent. But even if you're right, this answer brings us no closer to solving the mystery of Fidelio."

traits.locale_text: "Her şey mümkün. Gittiğinde hayat onun için çok zordu. Bedeni ilaçları ve implantları kabul etmedi, arada çıldırır gibi oluyordu. Bunlar en güçlüleri bile tüketir, pişman eder ve tövbe etmesine vesile olur. Haklı olsanız bile bu cevap, bizi Fidelio gizemine ışık tutmaya yaklaştırmıyor."
